member.shortcv: Nikos Korfiatis is a Research Assistant at ELTRUN where he also serves as a technical support specialist for the prototyping part of RTD Projects. He is currently pursuing his BSc in Management Information Systems from the Department of Management Science and Technology, AUEB. His research interests are in the tranformations of the information supply chain in the semantic web context. Mr. Korfiatis is also technical support officer for the Special Interest Group in Semantic Web and Information Systems of the Association of Information Systems AIS. His is member of the ACM and AIS
